//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "garage_guy", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "shoot_player" )
	{
		set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "OFF" );
		set ( "SET_STANCE", "Crouch" );
		wait ( 1000.000 );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "shelf" );
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Attack" );
	}

	dowait ( "shoot_player" );
	wait ( 2000.000 );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "player" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
}
